dao.name: QRY_ROW_HOURCE_MIN_BATCH_DAT
dao.statement: SELECT MIN(BATCH_DAT) as batchDat FROM RMINV_DT WHERE ATHENA_ID = ? AND trim(HOTEL_COD) = trim(?) AND BATCH_DAT >= ? AND trim(ROOM_NOS) = trim(?) AND ASSIGN_STA = 'Y'
